title: Mungus
description:
The Mungus can be found in the Mushroom Fields biome.

They will randomly shed Mungal Spores.

Mungus with Mushrooms on their head will fire beams at Mushrooms. If the Mushrooms are placed on Mycelium or Podzol, the beam turns them into large Mushrooms. Otherwise, the Mushrooms spread to adjacent blocks.
